RecipeDef.label: perform autopsy
RecipeDef.description: Doctors hone their skills by testing their techniques on corpses.

RecipeDef.label: Recycle apparel into useable textiles
RecipeDef.description: Shreds apparel and reforms into useable textiles. Output is based upon material used. Crafters do this low skilled Job.

RecipeDef.label: Make fancy light power armor helmet
RecipeDef.description: Make fancy light power armor helmet.

RecipeDef.label: Make fishing rod
RecipeDef.description: Make a fishing rod with some wood, a string and a piece of steel for the hook.

RecipeDef.label: butcher creature
RecipeDef.description: Butchers a creature to obtain its meat in usable form.

RecipeDef.label: shell mashgons
RecipeDef.description: Shell mashgons to get little and tasty pieces of mashgon meat.

RecipeDef.label: prepare sduiggles
RecipeDef.description: Chop down a sduiggles to get its 7 gelatinous tentacles.

RecipeDef.label: gut seasnake
RecipeDef.description: Gut fresh seasnakes to get cookable fish filets.

RecipeDef.label: gut blueblade
RecipeDef.description: Gut fresh blueblades to get cookable fish filets.

RecipeDef.label: butcher tailteeth
RecipeDef.description: Butcher a tailteeth to obtain highly nutritious steaks.

RecipeDef.label: supply mashgon eggs
RecipeDef.description: Supply some eggs of a mashgon to breed. You only need to do it when there is no fish in the basin or you want to change the bred species.

RecipeDef.label: supply blueblade eggs
RecipeDef.description: Supply some eggs of a blueblade to breed. You only need to do it when there is no fish in the basin or you want to change the bred species.

RecipeDef.label: supply tailteeth eggs
RecipeDef.description: Supply some eggs of a tailteeth to breed. You only need to do it when there is no fish in the basin or you want to change the bred species.

RecipeDef.label: Make herbal medicine
RecipeDef.description: Make simple herbal medicine from raw xerigium.

RecipeDef.label: make medicine
RecipeDef.description: Make medicine from herbal medicine and cloth.

RecipeDef.label: brew medical drink
RecipeDef.description: Brew a bottle of medical drink to boost the immune system.

RecipeDef.label: Make mineral sonar module
RecipeDef.description: Make a mineral sonar module using steel and integrated circuits boards.

RecipeDef.label: make paint set
RecipeDef.description: Create paint by boiling petals of the spectago plant until the gum and pigments bind. Combine with other materials.

RecipeDef.label: create tempera paint set
RecipeDef.description: Create paint by boiling petals of the spectago plant until the gum and pigments bind. Combine with eggs and other materials.

RecipeDef.label: Make Human rug
RecipeDef.description: Holy crap, that's a human! What are you doing!?

RecipeDef.label: make hauler bot
RecipeDef.description: Make a basic bot capable of hauling stuff around.

RecipeDef.label: make cleaner bot
RecipeDef.description: Make a basic bot capable of cleaning.

RecipeDef.label: make cook bot
RecipeDef.description: Make an advanced bot capable of cooking.

RecipeDef.label: make miner bot
RecipeDef.description: Make an advanced bot capable of mining.

RecipeDef.label: make farmer bot
RecipeDef.description: Make an advanced bot capable of growing plants.

RecipeDef.label: make crafter bot
RecipeDef.description: Make an advanced bot capable of crafting.
